title: Cant bann or select champions.
body:
Im on a 40 min bann cause champions just wont show up
I cant pick shit
so its considered a dodge

replies.body:
Sorry to hear about the dodge penalty, though 40 minutes is a bit high and shouldn't exceed 30.  It sounds like assets aren't loading properly during champion select, and I'd like to help.  To start, enable [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode incase there is too much pc stress going on during champ select, which will remove the fancy aesthetics.

Test it in a custom game, and if the issue continues then a connection problem might be struggling to load assets for you.  In that case, you'll want to go through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix that up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
